comments.comments_text: Mario Rui (Napoli) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Napoli) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender. Napoli have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Napoli work the corner short. The ball is passed to a nearby teammate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] work the corner short. The ball is passed to a nearby teammate.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Mario Rui (Napoli) is cleared away by the defence. The linesman points to the corner flag, Napoli are going to take it.

comments.comments_text: Mario Rui (Napoli) sends over a poor, overhit cross from the corner kick and the ball goes out of play.

comments.comments_text: Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) sees a yellow card from Istvan Kovacs after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.

comments.comments_text: Ismael Bennacer (AC Milan) has acres of space after latching on to a precise pass into the box. He doesn't hesitate to unleash a great effort which ends up in the bottom left corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has acres of space after latching on to a precise pass into the box. He doesn't hesitate to unleash a great effort which ends up in the bottom left corner.

comments.comments_text: Referee Istvan Kovacs halts the game and wanders over to the touchline to talk to Stefano Pioli, then shows him a yellow.

comments.comments_text: Sandro Tonali (AC Milan) sends the corner into the box, but Alex Meret intercepts it and averts the threat. AC Milan will take a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: The linesman makes the right call and AC Milan will have a corner.

comments.comments_text: Ismael Bennacer (AC Milan) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Eljif Elmas (Napoli) attempts to convert a cross into a goal, but his promising header from near the penalty spot towards the roof of the net is denied by a decent save from Mike Maignan. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Napoli will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger. Good work from Napoli as they win a corner.

comments.comments_text: Andre Zambo Anguissa (Napoli) should have been more careful. He commits a bad foul, receives his second yellow card and is sent-off!

comments.comments_text: The main referee, Istvan Kovacs, is apparently not going to tolerate any discussions. Min-Jae Kim (Napoli) is given a yellow card for dissent.
